heading: HR00607
0:
RESOLUTION
URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, TO INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION, IN DETERMINING THE NEED TO REINSTATE THE BUREAU OF DENTAL SERVICES IN THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE INCREASE OF NUMBER OF DENTIST WORKING IN THE GOVERNMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2020-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00607
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, TO INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION, IN DETERMINING THE NEED TO REINSTATE THE BUREAU OF DENTAL SERVICES IN THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE INCREASE OF NUMBER OF DENTIST WORKING IN THE GOVERNMENT
